General.Name: Kenmare Resources PLC
General.Description: Kenmare Resources plc, together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells mineral sand products in China, the rest of Asia, Europe, the United States, and internationally. It operates the Moma Titanium Minerals Mine located on the northeast coast of Mozambique. The company's products include ilmenite, rutile, and zircon; and concentrates, including secondary zircon and mineral sand concentrates. As of December 31, 2022, it had a total proved and probable ore reserves of 1,507 million tons. The company was formerly known as Kenmare Oil Exploration plc and changed its name to Kenmare Resources plc in 1987. Kenmare Resources plc was incorporated in 1972 and is headquartered in Dublin, Ireland.
